subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Vick, signed last week, connected with Martavis Bryant for a 63-yard completion on his first snap from scrimmage during a 43-19 preseason loss to the Bills.
snippet: Vick, signed last week, connected with Martavis Bryant for a 63-yard completion on his first snap from scrimmage during a 43-19 preseason loss to the Bills.
